plot outline: Kulsoom (Noor) is engaged to Sarwar Shah (Babar Butt), but she is deeply in love with Zill-e-Shah (Shan). Later in an encounter Zill-Shah (Shan) kills Sarwar (Babar Ali), therefore sent to Jail. As Zill-e-Shah returns from jail, he finds Kulsoom (Noor) married to Abid Shah (Safqat Cheema), the elder brother of Sarwar (Babar Ali). She is not comfortable, so is Zill-e-Shah. In his sought to forget his past, Zill-e-Shah adopts alcohol and company of courtesans. There he meets Sitara (Saima) a dancer, and they fall in love.
title: Zill-E-Shah
plot: Zille Shah kills Sarwar to marry his love Kulsoom but gets imprisoned. Upon release he finds her married to the brother of Sarwar. In sought to forget this he adopts alcohol and company of a courtesan Sitara but eventually falls for her.

Kulsoom (Noor) is engaged to Sarwar Shah (Babar Butt), but she is deeply in love with Zill-e-Shah (Shan). Later in an encounter Zill-Shah (Shan) kills Sarwar (Babar Ali), therefore sent to Jail. As Zill-e-Shah returns from jail, he finds Kulsoom (Noor) married to Abid Shah (Safqat Cheema), the elder brother of Sarwar (Babar Ali). She is not comfortable, so is Zill-e-Shah. In his sought to forget his past, Zill-e-Shah adopts alcohol and company of courtesans. There he meets Sitara (Saima) a dancer, and they fall in love.::Khaliwali

Zill-e-Shah is deeply in love with Kulsoom and she loves him too. Under mysterious circumstances Kulsoom gets married to Abid Shah, a rival of Zill-e-Shah. He is not comfortable with this situation and in an attempt to forget his past, Zill-e-Shah adopts alcohol and company of courtesans.::yasirchaudhary20
